Sentencas: The effect of alloy heat treatment on the oxidation kinetics and oxide scale microstructure of Crofer 22 APU has been studied.
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: Parabolic oxidation rate constants were measured for the as-received alloy and after pre-oxidation heat treatment in argon at 1050 degrees C for 1 and 4 h. The oxide scale microstructure was investigated using scanning electron microscopy, focused ion beam milling and transmission electron microscopy.
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: It was found that the alloy forms a two-layer scale with a continuous chromia layer and a discontinuous MnCr2O4 overlayer.
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: Two forms of internal oxides were also formed: subscale pockets of spinet and isolated TiOx precipitates in the underlying alloy.
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: The pre-oxidation heat treatment had a profound effect on the grain size and morphology of the Cr2O3 and MnCr2O4 layers in the scale.
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: The heat-treated samples exhibit a 3.5x lower parabolic oxidation rate constant than the as-received Crofer 22 APU.
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: This improvement in oxidation resistance is attributed to the dramatic differences in the morphology of the oxide scale that forms during the earliest stages of oxidation (<5 h).
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU

Sentencas: The implications of these findings for oxidation mechanisms and long-term SOFC performance are discussed.
Titulo: Effects of alloy heat treatment on oxidation kinetics and scale morphology for Crofer 22 APU
